title: League Points
body: Ok, So it Is Gonna Be Almost 3 years Since I Am Playing League, And I Am Still Stucked In B5. Whenever I get Promoted, I get 5-10 lp When I Win. Like Recently I Got Promoted to b4 Then Won 3 Matches In a Row, It was total 23 lp and then lost 22 lp, Like Wth Is Going On, I am Not a Toxic Player Or Some noob Player, How Am I Supposed to Get Out Of Bronze Like This. Please Help Its really Frustrating. I Win less Lp And Lose More lp, Please Someone Reply.

replies.body:
I've been bored lately, if you want some lessons add me on either this account (jackbar) or Onion Mate or Great Sex.
The ranked system is based on how you play, if you're convinced that you're playing better than the elo you're 'stuck' in, then it's not the game, it's your attitude.

LP gains are related to your MMR. A basic summary: if you have lower MMR than the people you beat, you gain more LP. If you have more MMR than the people you beat, you gain less LP. You gain MMR for every victory you have against higher skilled players, and lose MMR if you lose against lower skilled players.

If you just started playing again from three years ago, then it's most likely your MMR has decayed to be really low (MMR decays faster than division rating does). You'll have to play plenty of games before it goes back up, and even if you win them all, since you won against people of lower skill level, you won't gain much MMR.

Hope that helps.
